items.name: ID
items.info: ID

items.name: fittingMethod
items.info: fitting method (1 for global fit, 2 for Kalman Filter)

items.name: c_x
items.info: x-coordinate of a helical trk point extrapolated to a cylinder at 25 cm radius from the lab origin (cm unit)

items.name: c_y
items.info: y-coordinate of a helical trk point extrapolated to a cylinder at 25 cm radius from the lab origin (cm unit)

items.name: c_z
items.info: z-coordinate of a helical trk point extrapolated to a cylinder at 25 cm radius from the lab origin (cm unit)b

items.name: c_ux
items.info: x-coordinate of a helical trk direction extrapolated to a cylinder at 25 cm radius from the lab origin (cm unit)

items.name: c_uy
items.info: y-coordinate of a helical trk direction extrapolated to a cylinder at 25 cm radius from the lab origin (cm unit)

items.name: c_uz
items.info: z-coordinate of a helical trk direction extrapolated to a cylinder at 25 cm radius from the lab origin (cm unit)

items.name: pathlength
items.info: total pathlength from the origin to the reference point (in cm)

items.name: q
items.info: charge

items.name: p
items.info: total momentum

items.name: pt
items.info: transverse momentum

items.name: phi0
items.info: helical track fit parameter: phi at DOCA

items.name: tandip
items.info: helical track fit parameter: dip angle

items.name: z0
items.info: helical track fit parameter: value of z at the DOCA

items.name: d0
items.info: helical track fit parameter: Distance of Closest Approach

items.name: cov_d02
items.info: helical track fit covariance matrix element : delta_d0^2

items.name: cov_d0phi0
items.info: helical track fit covariance matrix element : delta_d0.delta_phi0

items.name: cov_d0rho
items.info: helical track fit covariance matrix element : delta_d0.delta_rho

items.name: cov_phi02
items.info: helical track fit covariance matrix element : delta_phi0^2

items.name: cov_phi0rho
items.info: helical track fit covariance matrix element : delta_phi0.delta_rho

items.name: cov_rho2
items.info: helical track fit covariance matrix element : delta_rho.delta_rho

items.name: cov_z02
items.info: helical track fit covariance matrix element : delta_z0^2

items.name: cov_tandip2
items.info: helical track fit covariance matrix element : delta_tandip^2

items.name: circlefit_chi2_per_ndf
items.info: Circle Fit chi^2/ndf

items.name: linefit_chi2_per_ndf
items.info: Line Fit chi^2/ndf
